title: Genesis
richText: To this day, nobody knows precisely what it was that caused it. Perhaps the power that had been spent lured another entity out of the void, or it might be that it simply awoke another divine entity from its slumber. Some even claim that in some mysterious way you ended up wasting your time reading all of this.

title: Genesis
richText:
Every 60 seconds somewhere in the world one minute passes.
The amount of time to read this is probably much shorter, but who knows? Maybe you are a slow reader. Anyway, either you are bored or login is taking way more than it should.

title: Genesis
richText: The world is flat (in game). If you are doubting it, launch the mapeditor. Round map would be weird to play on anyway. Like how would you connect the sides?

title: Genesis
richText: Most worlds built on Evolutions datapack are extinct by now. Talking about natural selection.

title: Genesis
richText: The summer update known as 8.60 launched on June 30 2010. Feeling old yet?

title: Genesis
richText: The development of first OTS engine started in 2002. In November 2003 OTserv 2.7 makes its way to sourceforge.

title: Genesis
richText: OT servers had only one floor until 2005. This is also the year when the servers explode in popularity and first server lists emerge.

title: Genesis
richText: The OTBM format developed by Simone, Spin and Primer debuted oficially in November 2005. Previously server maps were in XML.

title: Genesis
richText: In February 2007 a new engine - The Forgotten Server got released by Talaturen (now Mark). Three months later he launched OTLand.

title: Genesis
richText: The first version of Remere's map editor had its release in December 2007.

title: Genesis
richText: 2005 was the most intense year for OT development.

title: Optional PvP
richText:
On Optional PvP game worlds, player killing is only possible within the scope of a guild war.
Therefore no one plays this kind of servers. Why would you play npvp anyway?

title: Open PvP
richText: On Open PvP game worlds you can kill other players, but actually no. Sometimes you can walk over magic walls, sometimes you don't. Sometimes you get white skull for no reason at all. Crazy, huh?

title: Hardcore PvP
richText: On Hardcore PvP worlds there are no restrictions whatsoever on player killing. Unfortunately someone thought that it will be a good idea to remove exp gain from killing other players.

title: Retro Open PvP
richText: The game worlds called Retro Open PvP game worlds are merely a shadow of what pvp game worlds used to be.

title: Retro Hardcore PvP
richText: They call it Retro Hardcore PvP, as if PvP-Enforced was a bad name.

title: XP Boost
richText: XP boosts increase your experience points your character gains from hunting for a certain time limit. And your spendings on this game.

title: Express Character World Transfer
richText: If you have already transferred your character to another game world in the last six months, just kidding. OT servers aren't that advanced yet.

title: Gold Pouch
richText: Story time: Back when I was new to this game and there was no shop window yet, I tried to buy that brown container with 20 slots. For some reason I kept getting bags, for 8 gold. Apparently, the brown container with 20 slots name was not bagpack.

title: Gold Converter
richText:
A Gold Converter comes in handy when you need capacity and your bags are packed with gold.
As if you couldn't just click on a stack of coins to change them.

title: Temple Teleport
richText: Teleporting to your hometown used to be bannable if you got caught by a GM. Now it's a store offer.

title: Prey Wildcard
richText: A prey is an animal that is hunted by another for food. To pray means addressing a prayer to a God or another deity. Have you prayed for a good prey today?

title: Magic Gold Converter
richText: If you ever feel dumb, just remember that some people spend real money in order to buy a gold converter that is more expensive than the gold you will get out of it.

title: Character Sex Change
richText: At some point you probably had a thought regarding what would the gameplay be like if you made a female character. Everyone did.

title: Tibia Coins
richText: There are two hundred coins in this picture. If you do not believe this, you can count them yourself.

title: Blessings
richText: If I had a gold coin for every tile walked to rebuy blessings after dying, I would probably have like 1k gold because I buy them at the inquisition headquarters. Here are some pieces of paper with cool pictures.

title: Store Categories
richText: In case you haven't noticed yet despite very intense efforts from the game creators, this game has in-game store and you can probably exchange your virtual currency for virtual goods. Just look at that giant button below your equipment. Neat, huh?

title: Twist of Fate
richText: Characters that die in a PvP fight will have names of their killers listed in their death lists.

title: Death Redemption
richText: Im case you die, the game offers extra ways of spending your money. The free to play model can get really annoying sometimes.

title: Potion Casks
richText: After all these years, the technology is finally here! You can finally refill your potions once you drink them. Of course they had to monetize it. Like why wouldn't they, right?

title: Potion Keks
richText: Potion keks can be purchased in the Store kekw

title: Store Inbox
richText: At some point some items had to be locked from trading. Someone really hated the possibility of moving some items between characters.

title: Security Hint
richText: Don't be dumb. Using qwer or 1234 in your password is a terrible idea.

title: Security Hint
richText: I would recommend you using two factor authentication in order to improve your account security, but knowing the reality, it probably doesn't work on the private server you are playing anyway.

title: Security Hint
richText: This is a very nice looking chest. I wonder if they can be found in game.

title: Security Hint
richText: Account sharing is usually a bad idea. If several people have access to one account, it's easier to get hacked and harder to find the culprit.

title: Security Hint
richText: Some server owners can not be trusted. Never use identical email/password combination on more than one server.

title: Security Hint
richText: Do not pay 10k to a pker. They'll kill you anyway. Learned it hard way.

title: Security Hint
richText: Other people can hear you mumbling your password.

title: Random Hint
richText: The widget for unjustified points in the Tibia client gives an overview of how unnecessarily complicated the PvP system had became.

title: Random Hint
richText: You can 'hide' your character via your account management page. This assuming the website supports this feature and it works properly.

title: Random Hint
richText:
The statement below is true.
The statement above is false.

title: Random Hint
richText: In the guild activity log, each guild member can view important data. Just kidding, this feature probably wasn't even implemented yet.

title: Random Hint
richText: If you enable antialiasing in your graphics options, your game will have its graphics antialiased. Unexpected.

title: Random Hint
richText: Opening four panels with a lot of containers and three analyzers will make you look like a skilled player.

title: Random Hint
richText: As the updates says - you give a poor man a fish and you feed him for a day. You teach him to a... to fish, you give him, you give him a... nononononono.

title: Random Hint
richText: There are shops that sell items. You can find them in the city.

title: Random Hint
richText: Connecting to this server takes so long you started reading these messages.

title: Random Hint
richText: If you are unable to afford food somehow despite gold coins being so easy to obtain, you can waste two hours by making a bread.

title: Random Hint
richText: If you are on a ship and the exit happens to be blocked, just use gnomebase hub, fool. Do not bother asking the captain for a kick. It probably doesn't work.

title: Random Hint
richText:
Nobody can survive without breathing! There is nothing worth dying for in sunken caves.
It is very easy to get lost and run out of air in these.

title: Random Hint
richText: There are hundreds of temples and other sacral places located on hundreds of servers, yet it is rarely explained which religion they belong to.

title: Random Hint
richText: If you inspect another character, expect them to ask you to get inspected back.

title: Random Hint
richText: Players can form groups called 'parties'. You will have certain advantages this way. Just please avoid going political, it's just a game.

title: Random Hint
richText: Place yourself in front of a door of your house and say 'aleta grav' to confuse your neighbours.

title: Random Hint
richText:
You can kick a character out of your home if you say 'alana sio' followed by the character name.
It is not a polite way to get rid of a guest though. Try asking nicely first.

title: Random Hint
richText: Due to performance issues, regular expressions other than * are not supported in OT invite lists for houses.

title: Random Hint
richText: If you played through a patch in which owning multiple houses per account became possible, you witnessed the destruction of the housing market yourself. Talking about immersion in games.

title: Random Hint
richText: At some point in time, some guilds became so powerful that they started dominating multiple servers.

title: Random Hint
richText: It used to be much much easier to found a new guild back in 2005. All you had to do was to find the guild master.

title: Random Hint
richText: Game servers are not airports. If you get angry and decide to quit, there is no need to announce your departure.

title: Random Hint
richText: If you have named your hotkey presets like your characters and have checked the option 'Auto-Switch Hotkey Preset', you have figured out how the feature works. To be honest, I had no idea until I read this tip.

title: Random Hint
richText: You won't waste your hunting supplies if you don't bring any to your hunt.

title: Random Hint
richText: And the Scrolls have foretold, of black wings in the cold, That when brothers wage war come unfurl... wait, wrong game, nevermind.

title: Random Hint
richText: Baiak servers are just YurOTS under a different name.

title: Random Hint
richText: The counter for your stamina indicates the time that is left until you have to buy next stamina doll.

title: Random Hint
richText: For some reason, it took over 25 years to add sound to this game.

title: Random Hint
richText: Consider relogging when visiting protection zones. It saves your character data in case of server crash.

title: Random Hint
richText: There are no servers built on Rookgaard map at the time of writing this tip.

title: Random Hint
richText: Kazordoon has a unique transportation system. As If they couldn't just use teleports like everyone else. Also their steamboat is terribly awful to reach.

title: Random Hint
richText:
Do not simply throw away your empty flasks.
Each flask dropped on the ground makes map clean take slightly longer.

title: Random Hint
richText: Outnumber or get outnumbered.

title: Random Hint
richText: Even though there is a special underwater area, it is not possible to move on water fields. The boots of waterwalking were a lie all along.

title: Random Hint
richText: Some cities are completely insane. Buildings with burning walls, up to five portals pretty much next to each other and don't even get me started on temples connected to warehouses.

title: Random Hint
richText: You can have nine action bars in total. That is 450 slots for your custom actions.

title: Random Hint
richText: You can see how well-organized the player is solely by looking at his Action bars.

title: Random Hint
richText: If you are a free account player, the game will make sure you will get the least amount of fun possible.

title: Random Hint
richText: Do not try to move house walls with cheats. It doesn't work anymore.

title: Random Hint
richText: Press Alt+F4 to show the exit dialog in the game window.

title: Random Hint
richText: 'Quick Login' allows logging in before the game assets load.

title: Random Hint
richText: Everything is affordable if you have enough tc.

title: Random Hint
richText: Too many people queued up for your favourite hunting spot? Dominate the server and the spot will be yours.

title: Random Hint
richText: Looking for a trash can in someone's house? Check under the sink.

title: Random Hint
richText: If you upgrade item tier, you have to reassign the item on the action bar.

title: Random Hint
richText: If a vice leader leaves an existing guild to join another one, he will be a disappointment for his former guild mates.

title: Random Hint
richText: If the server is no longer possible to login, chances are that the edition is over.

title: Random Hint
richText: Foxtails do not drop from foxes.

title: Random Hint
richText: Life is too short to play on a bugged server.

title: Random Hint
richText: The client may look like a mess at first, but you can remove a lot of UI elements you won't be using.

title: Random Hint
richText: If you ever feel useless, remember that some baiak servers have achievements system.

title: Random Hint
richText: The Supply Stash may be available in your server. Or not.

title: Random Hint
richText:
A software tester walks into a bar. Orders a beer, orders 2 beers, orders 0 beers, orders 999999999 beers, orders a lizard, orders -1 beers, orders qwertyuiop.

A real customer walks into the bar and asks where the bathroom is. The bar goes up in flames.

title: Random Hint
richText: The Compendium could probably offer you a lot of information about the server you're playing, if only anyone knew how to set it up.

title: Store Outfit
richText: The Mercenary carries a powerful, razor-sharp axe on his shoulders that effortlessly cuts through any armour and bone. Unless you buy this outfit on a mage character.

title: General Game Options
richText:
Check 'Stay Logged In for Session' to stay logged in. For session.
Otherwise, you will not stay logged in for session.

title: General Game Options
richText: If 'Highlight Mouse Target' is enabled, the option is enabled and mouse target gets highlighted.

title: General Game Options
richText: Enable 'Use Native Mouse Cursor' if you want to replace ugly client cursor with your uwu cute system cursor.

title: General Game Options
richText: Selecting a character will log you into game. Or not. Depends how many times you click.

title: General Game Options
richText: Whenever you cast a spell, a new kitten is born somewhere.

title: General Game Options
richText: The settings menu got way more complicated than it should. Fortunately you don't have to use it once you configure everything right.

title: General Game Options
richText: Advanced PvP options are not available because no one really liked them.

title: General Game Options
richText: If you enable 'Press CTRL to Drag Complete Stacks', you will drag complete stacks when holding CTRL.

title: General Game Options
richText: If you open the Options menu for the first time, you will find yourself confused.

title: Messages Options
richText: Whenever you examine characters or items, the characters or items examine you back.

title: Messages Options
richText: Whenever another character casts a spell, a new kitten is born somewhere as well.

title: Messages Options
richText:
Whenever you cast a spell, you will see the magic words in your game window.
'Please' and 'Thank You' are not spells.

title: Skullfrost
richText: Guys looking like this have 100% chance of stealing your aggro.

title: Emberwing
richText: Paladins have coolest looking pets. Change my mind.

title: Grovebeast
richText: No friends? No problem. Just summon one to tank damage for you.

title: Thundergiant
richText: You're in a club and this guy slaps your GF's ass - what do?

title: Store Mount
richText: The Armoured War Horse is a great choice for people who failed in life and never caught a free version of this mount on their own.
